solution_line_template: 5 packs of gum contain {packs_per_carton}*{sticks_per_pack}=<<{packs_per_carton}*{sticks_per_pack}={sticks_per_carton}>>{sticks_per_carton} sticks of gum.
If each brown box contains 4 cartons, 8 brown boxes contain {num_brown_boxes} * {cartons_per_brown_box}= <<{num_brown_boxes}*{cartons_per_brown_box}={total_cartons}>>{total_cartons} cartons.
So, 8 brown boxes contain {total_cartons} * {sticks_per_carton}=<<{total_cartons}*{sticks_per_carton}={total_sticks}>>{total_sticks} sticks of gum.
